DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate Besivance equal Vigamox safety tolerance use prophylactically subject undergoing routine cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: 2-Site Safety Study Besivance Versus Vigamox Prophylactically Routine Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects assign receive either Besivance Vigamox ( 1:1 ) administer 1 drop study eye 4 time daily start 3 day prior cataract surgery continue 7 day post-operatively . Sixty subject ( 30 Ophthalmology Consultants 30 Ophthalmology Associates ) race either sex , require cataract extraction plan implantation posterior chamber intraocular lens .
DOC.criteria: Men woen race , 18 year old cataract , plan undergo cataract extraction phacoemulsification implantation posterior chamber intraocular lens Study eye patient , opinion investigator , experience improvement visual acuity follow surgery Patients able understand sign inform consent form approve IRB Planned multiple procedure cataract/IOL implantation surgery . Note : A planned limbal relax incision may perform correction astigmatism Use topical ocular systemic antibiotic within 14 day prior surgery study exit History Fuch 's Corneal Endothelial Dystrophy Any ocular inflammation ( aqueous cell flare great Grade 0 ) ocular pain study eye present baseline visit . Recent ( within 6 month ) ocular trama operative eye ( include intraocular surgery ) A history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease ( eg , iritis , scleritis , uveitis , iridocyclitis , rubeosis iridis ) operative eye Currently diagnose uncontrolled glaucoma operative eye Congenital ocular anomaly ( eg , aniridia , congenital cataract ) operative eye A visually nonfunctional fellow eye define best correct visual acuity < /= 35 ETDRS letter ( 20/200 Snellen equivalent ) bad Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day cataract surgery Known suspect allergy hypersensitivity component either test article Women childbearing potential ( surgically sterilize post menopausal ) may participate study follow condition exist : 1. breast feed 2. positive urine pregnancy test screen 3. willing undergo urine pregnancy test upon enter exit study 4. intend become pregnant duration study ; , 5. agree use adequate birth control method duration study
